data.message: I recently accepted a friend request from someone hacking a friend's account.  What do I do to protect my account?

replies.message: Hi Bobbie. We can take you through a few steps to make sure any recent changes to your account were made by you as well as help you change your password and secure your account. To get started, visit: http://bit.ly/2rnTvsV. You can also report a profile by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2pHSkIA. -William
Thank yo:u, I just went to the help page and I believe all has been resolved.  :)
